label: 朝野群載
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: [A] work in thirty books (kan) containing imperial decrees (senji) and documents relating to court conferences, Buddhist matters, provincial affairs, etc., [and] has a foreword dated this year [1116] by its compiler, Miyoshi Tameyasu (A, p. 376).  [巻、宣旨、三善為康]
